timeline.bodyText:
this method is hard to follow and pretty complex
my suggestion is to create 2 new classes:

DnsZoneDeploymentService: responsible for creating the DNS Zone if it's missing, or just wait for it to finish, etc
NetworkLinkDepleymentService: add/create network links to the zone. I think if we reach this we can be sure we have the DNS zone deployed

After this refactor you could get rid of:

if (dnsZonesDeployed && networkLinksDeployed) as subclasses would check if they have to do anything
createDnsZonesAndNetworkLinks as it would be always 2 separate steps
